meanings.definition: The quality of being offensive or unpleasant to the taste.
meanings.sent1: The distastefulness of the food made me cringe.
meanings.sent2: Her distastefulness towards spicy food was well-known.
meanings.sent3: The distastefulness of the dish was so extreme, it seemed to be a prank.
meanings.sent4: The distastefulness of the soup was like a bitter reminder of bad memories.
meanings.sent5: The distastefulness of the sauce lingered in my mouth long after the meal.

meanings.definition: The feeling of dislike or aversion towards something.
meanings.sent1: His distastefulness for horror movies was evident in his refusal to watch them.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hide her distastefulness for the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The cat's distastefulness for water was comical as it tried to avoid bath time.
meanings.sent4: The distastefulness she felt towards the idea was like a heavy weight on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The distastefulness towards the smell was so strong, she had to leave the room.
